content.text: This clause of IS 17017 (Part 2/Sec 1) is applicable  except as follows:
24.1 This clause of IS 17017 (Part 2/Sec 1) is applicable  except as follows:

For accessories dependent upon a resistor coding to  define the accessory's assigned current rating, the test  shall be repeated using a set of samples for each resistor  coding value and tested at the maximum current  corresponding to that resistor coding value.

requirements.text: For accessories dependent upon a resistor coding to  define the accessory's assigned current rating, the test  shall be repeated using a set of samples for each resistor  coding value and tested at the maximum current  corresponding to that resistor coding value.
